trader.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who buys and sells goods or stocks
trader.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a small trader who sells hats in Oxford
To the surprise of many Wall Street traders, the dollar rose yesterday.
trader.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who deals in shares, bonds, currencies, COMMODITIES (=oil, metal, farm products) etc on a market either for themselves or for a financial institution
trader.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: To the surprise of many traders, the dollar rose in European markets.
trader.translation[1].definitions[1].def: someone who buys and sells goods
